snippet: President Giorgio Napolitano on Tuesday said he would not reverse the tax fraud conviction of Silvio Berlusconi and warned his party against trying to bring down the government over the issue.
abstract: Italian Pres Giorgio Napolitano rules out any reversal of tax fraud conviction against former Prime Min Silvio Berlusconi and warns his party against trying to bring down government over issue.
lead_paragraph: President Giorgio Napolitano on Tuesday said he would not reverse the tax fraud conviction of Silvio Berlusconi and warned his party against trying to bring down the government over the issue.

headline.main: Italy: President Rules Out Reversal of Berlusconi’s Fraud Conviction
headline.print_headline: Italy: President Rules Out Reversal Of Berlusconi’s Fraud Conviction
